title: Erigon panic with "send on closed channel"
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`

2022.02.03-beta

#### Actual behaviour

This is happening on all our erigon nodes (ropsten, mainnet etc) even after https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/issues/3496
